titles.title: Omae wa Mada Gunma o Shiranai
Omae wa Mada Gunma wo Shiranai
Omagun
お前はまだグンマを知らない
You Don`t Know Gunma Yet
너는 아직 군마를 모른다
你还是不懂群马

anime.description: * Based on http://anidb.net/cr53604 [Ida Hiroto]`s comedy seinen manga. http://anidb.net/ch95016 [Kamitsuki Nori] moves from Chiba Prefecture to a fictionalized version of Gunma Prefecture northwest of Tokyo. Before moving to Gunma, Kamitsuki only sees that the prefecture has a fearsome reputation on the net. Upon moving, he soon makes contact with the people who hold a strong love of Gunma`s culture. Source: ANN

externalentity.identifier: お前はまだグンマを知らない

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: manga
tag.description: Manga is the lifeblood that drives the anime industry. Everything and its mother is based on manga. However! There are exceptions where the manga was not the basis for the anime. It`s common practice to make manga adaptations of many popular anime, there`s a manga based on Evangelion, and two (one shounen and one shoujo) based on each of Escaflowne and Mahou Tsukai Tai. Also it`s quite common to release manga and anime versions of a story in parallel, for instance Nadesico and Shoujo Kakumei Utena. There are also cases where an anime continues in a manga, as in the case of Angel Beats! and Angel Beats: Heaven`s Door, or reverse. See also http://anidb.net/t6493 [manhua] and http://anidb.net/t5010 [manhwa].

tag.name: adapted into JDrama
tag.description: This anime is a http://anidb.net/t2797 [new original work], and it has been adapted into a JDrama. A JDrama (Japanese drama), also called "terebi dorama" ("television drama") or "dorama" for short, is a Japanese live action television series. Japan produces many drama series every year, from a huge variety of genres. Like anime, they generally air in three-month seasons or multiples thereof, with new shows airing every season. Some kinds of drama, especially the morning or afternoon ones, tend to be broadcast daily, while evening ones tend to be broadcast weekly, also like anime. In exceedingly rare instances, a specific episode of a new original work anime can also be adapted.

tag.name: short episodes
tag.description: Short episodes are regular episodes that are much shorter than the standard length. This means up to and including 10 minutes; shows with episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length are http://anidb.net/t6494 [half-length episodes] instead. Not to be confused with http://anidb.net/t6349 [multi-segment episodes], which are regular episodes that are split into several short segments (parts), usually with separate titles and independent storylines.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: adapted into Japanese movie
tag.description: This anime is a http://anidb.net/t2797 [new original work], and it has been adapted into a Japanese movie. In exceedingly rare instances, a specific episode of a new original work anime can also be adapted.

tag.name: adapted into other media
tag.description: This anime is a http://anidb.net/t2797 [new original work], and it has been adapted into other media formats. In exceedingly rare instances, a specific episode of a new original work anime can also be adapted.

episode.title: 焼きまんじゅう
Grilled Sweet Buns
Les manjû grillés
Yaki Manjuu
episode.summary: Todoroki forces Kamitsuki to eat grilled sweet buns which are airy dough coated with a thick, sweet miso sauce and then grilled. It is well known that if anyone not from Gunma tastes grilled sweet buns, that person will die... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: つる舞う形のグンマ県
Gunma Is Shaped Like a Crane in Flight
Gunma a la forme d`une grue qui danse
Tsuru Maukata no Gunma-ken
episode.summary: Having been taken to the tatami room as punishment, Kamitsuki is first presented with the challenge of Joumou karuta. Outsiders are unable to recite all 44 by heart. However, Todoroki arrives at the last second and issues a different challenge: feeding Kamitsuki grilled sweet buns. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 起立, 注目, 礼
Stand, Attention, Bow
Debout, attention, saluez
Kiritsu, Chuumoku, Rei
episode.summary: Kamitsuki arrives at his new high school, but does not find his classmates welcoming. After messing up the commands at the beginning of class and being tied up with large Himokawa udon noodles, he realizes there is much he does not know about the local culture. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 心にググッとグンマ県
With Gusto in Gunma
Bienvenue à Gunma
Kokoro ni Gugutto Gunma-ken
episode.summary: Kamitsuki Nori is being transferred to a high school in Gunma. While riding the train, he remembers his friend Todoroki moved there in elementary school. Todoroki, warns Kamitsuki to stay away. As the train gets closer to Gunma, Kamitsuki realizes the doors have stopped opening automatically... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 海
Beach
La mer
Umi
episode.summary: Kamitsuki is at his cousin Minoru`s sports day. Kamitsuki remembers when he and Minoru went to the beach, but something about Minoru seemed odd... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: からっ風
Dry Wind
Le vent sec
Karakkaze
episode.summary: Winters in Gunma bring dry winds strong enough to knock over bicycles. Kamitsuki had to fight the wind getting to school, but then uses it to ride home very quickly! He encounters a boy having trouble getting across a bridge where the wind is very strong and becomes frustrated with Gunma, but then he tries some dried sweet potatoes and is happy to be there again. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 上毛かるたの歴史
The History of Jomo Karuta
L’histoire des cartes Jômo
Joumou Karuta no Rekishi
episode.summary: Todoroki explains to Kamitsuki about Shinooka Kyo and her group of elite Joumou karuta champions, including a history of Joumou karuta. Kamitsuki doesn`t understand why Joumou karuta is so important, but decides to buy a set. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: JKJ
JKJ
JKJ
JKJ
episode.summary: Kamitsuki is getting used to Gunma after just one day and is feeling more confident. He is approached by Shinooka Kyo, a girl from his class claiming to want to get to know him better. But does she have an ulterior motive? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 我々はまだグンマを知らなかった
We Didn`t Know Gunma Yet
Nous ne connaissions pas encore Gunma
Wareware wa Mada Gunma o Shiranakatta
episode.summary: Kamitsuki, Todoroki, Shinooka and Yeti are driving to Myogi Shrine in Todoroki`s senpai`s car. Mt. Myogi is one of three wonders of Japan, and Shinooka is excited to visit the shrine. Kamitsuki grins about Shinooka`s regular clothes until a truck appears from behind a curve... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自販機店舗
Vending Machine Shop
Les restaurants distributeurs automatiques
Jihanki Tenpo
episode.summary: After school, Kamitsuki parks his bike and stares at a sign which reads "vending machine store." Inside the he finds an udon vending machine. What kind of place is this? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: グンマの運動会 (後編)
Gunma Sports Day (Part 2)
La journée sportive (Partie 2)
Gunma no Undoukai (Kouhen)
episode.summary: In a strange turn of events, Kamitsuki and Shinooka are going to race each other. The scavenger hunt theme is Gunma specialties. Kamitsuki is at a disadvantage, but he`ll try his hardest. The item he draws is... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: グンマの運動会 (前編)
Gunma Sports Day (Part 1)
La journée sportive (Partie 1)
Gunma no Undoukai (Zenpen)
episode.summary: Kamitsuki and Minoru are happy to see each other after so long. Kamitsuki tells Minoru he`s going to take some good videos of his sports day. Kamitsuki asks which team Minoru is on, but he seems to have said something strange. Source: crunchyroll
